typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SOURCE_CODE_KEY as string,
		SOURCE_SYSTEM as string,
		TARGET_CODE as string,
		TARGET_DESCRIPTION as string,
		CODE_TYPE as string,
		CODE_TYPE_ID as double,
		CODE2 as string,
		OM_X_REF as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> TCrossReference
source(output(
		SOURCE_CODE_KEY as string,
		SOURCE_SYSTEM as string,
		TARGET_CODE as string,
		TARGET_DESCRIPTION as string,
		CODE_TYPE as string,
		CODE_TYPE_ID as double,
		PARENT_CODE_TYPE_ID as double,
		PARENT_TARGET_CODE as string,
		CODE2 as string,
		OM_X_REF as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> VCrossReference
TCrossReference, VCrossReference union(byName: true)~> TVCrossRefCOUNTRY
TCrossReference, VCrossReference union(byName: true)~> TVCrossRefREGION
TCrossReference, VCrossReference union(byName: true)~> TVCrossRefAREA
FilterCOUNTRY50, FilterREGION219 join(TVCrossRefCOUNTRY@PARENT_TARGET_CODE == TVCrossRefREGION@PARENT_TARGET_CODE
	&& TVCrossRefCOUNTRY@PARENT_CODE_TYPE_ID == TVCrossRefREGION@PARENT_CODE_TYPE_ID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> JoinCOUNTRYogREGION
JoinCOUNTRYogREGION, FilterAREA219 join(TVCrossRefCOUNTRY@PARENT_TARGET_CODE == TVCrossRefAREA@TARGET_CODE
	&& TVCrossRefCOUNTRY@PARENT_CODE_TYPE_ID == TVCrossRefAREA@CODE_TYPE_ID
	&& 219 == TVCrossRefAREA@CODE_TYPE_ID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1
TVCrossRefREGION filter(CODE_TYPE_ID==219) ~> FilterREGION219
TVCrossRefAREA filter(CODE_TYPE_ID==219) ~> FilterAREA219
TVCrossRefCOUNTRY filter(CODE_TYPE_ID==50) ~> FilterCOUNTRY50
